text: Warts and All is an album series of live recorded shows by the American jam band moe. As of mid-2007, there are six volumes. ==Warts and All series== *Volume 1: Recorded live on February 28, 2001 at the Scranton Cultural Center in Scranton, Pennsylvania. *Volume 2: Recorded live on February 23, 2002 at The Tabernacle in Atlanta, Georgia. *Volume 3: Recorded live on November 13, 1998 at the Vic Theater in Chicago, Illinois. *Volume 4: Recorded live on July 18, 1998 at the Copper Dragon in Carbondale, Illinois. *Volume 5: Recorded live on February 22, 2005 at the Val Air Ballroom in Des Moines, Iowa. *Volume 6: Recorded live on January 28, 2007 at Liberty Hall in Lawrence, Kansas. Category:Live album series Category:Moe (band) live albums Category:2000s live albums
title: Warts and All
